div.p: REAUMURIA in botany : A genus oſ the pen-tagynia order, belonging to the pentandria claſs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking under th¢
13th order, Succulent#. The calyx is hexaphyllous, and there are five petals ; the capſule is unilocular, quinque-valved, and polyſpermous.
